channel.title: gear on ftard.me
channel.description: Recent content in gear on ftard.me

item.title: My Gear
item.description: This is my ’exhaustive’ gear list. I will hopefully update this page regularly to include every major and minor little obscure piece of gear I own. Often times people ask me about a thing I use but I can’t remember for the life of me the name of it let alone a link to it. Like for instance my fethed or the exact mic stand I use. Please peruse and enjoy!
